tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flood_forecast ( 
  date DATE, 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  flood_likelihood FLOAT, 
  estimated_losses NUMERIC, 
  reinsurance_strategy VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE FloodOccurrences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    forecasted_depth DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE LossEstimations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    estimated_loss DECIMAL,
    affected_area FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ReinsuranceStrategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(100),
    risk_profile VARCHAR(50),
    target_coverage DECIMAL,
    premium_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE flood_occurrences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  date DATE,
  severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE estimated_losses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  estimated_amount DECIMAL,
  cause VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE reinsurance_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR,
  strategy_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE flood_forecasts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  forecasted_severity INT,
  confidence_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  event_type VARCHAR,
  damage_amount DECIMAL
)
